en-US.validation.field_invalid_id: Field '{{.fieldname}}' contains an invalid object id value.
en-US.validation.field_minlen: Field '{{.fieldname}}' must be at least {{.minlen}} characters long.
en-US.validation.field_maxlen: Field '{{.fieldname}}' can be maximum {{.maxlen}} characters long.
